blog.title: About this site
blog.excerpt: This site uses Astro, Tailwind, Ruby and AI. Astro means I can try any JS framework. Tailwind is extensible and has great convenience features. Ruby is used for backend tasks. AI generates keywords for search.

blog.title: The Journey to Arch
blog.excerpt: Started with Ubuntu, switched to Arch. Debian had dependency errors. Dual booting Arch and Debian caused boot loop. Finally settled on Arch.
